name: StrayRays
description:
STRAY RAYS

Light rays have escaped. Your objective is to guide them towards the black hole. Use your mouse to left click – hold and drag to create a mirror that the rays can bounce off of. The mirrors you put down get smaller as rays bounce off of them, and they disappear after a while.

In every stage you’ll have to deal with more and more rays that are faster than the previous ones, but be careful: If any of the rays escapes, you’ll have to capture two others in its place. Make sure the light doesn’t get out of your control.
